leitstudien.titel: Reducing system costs through offshore sector coupling — up to EUR 1.7 bn/year
leitstudien.beschreibung: The Frontier Economics study demonstrates that offshore sector coupling can reduce system costs by up to EUR 1.7 billion per year.

leitstudien.titel: Combined transport systems reduce expansion costs by EUR 31 bn
leitstudien.beschreibung: Combined transport and connection concepts for offshore hydrogen can reduce expansion costs by EUR 31 billion.

leitstudien.titel: Hydrogen production at sea — significant potential confirmed
leitstudien.beschreibung: The DNV study confirms the significant potential of hydrogen production at sea and examines both technical and economic feasibility.

leitstudien.titel: Clear advantages of hydrogen production at sea
leitstudien.beschreibung: The brief study demonstrates clear advantages of decentralised hydrogen production at sea compared to centralised onshore solutions.
